items.q: Where can I calculate my staking profit?
items.a: You can calculate your staking profit directly on this page using our interactive calculator. Simply choose a plan, enter the amount of TON you want to stake and the number of days — and you will immediately see your projected earnings.

items.q: How long does it take to receive rewards?
items.a: You receive rewards daily, starting within 24 hours after your stake is confirmed on the network. The funds are distributed automatically by our portfolio algorithms.

items.q: What is the minimum amount to start staking?
items.a: The minimum amount to start staking is 10 TON. We’ve designed all plans so that you can start earning rewards with just 10 TON.

items.q: Can I withdraw my funds at any time?
items.a: Yes, you can withdraw your funds at any time. Simply go to your dashboard, select the "Withdraw" option, and confirm the transaction through your wallet — the funds will be returned to your address.

items.q: Are there any extra fees or hidden charges?
items.a: We do not charge any additional fees for using the platform. The only costs are the TON network (gas) fees for transfers and withdrawals. The platform itself is completely free.

items.q: How secure is my staking deposit?
items.a: Your funds are stored in smart contracts that follow TON’s security standards. We use verified open-source contracts and conduct regular security audits.
